mapper.select:
SELECT dor.`DPCOI_ORDER_ID` as rrProblemOrderId, dor.`DPCOI_ORDER_STATE` as rrProblemOrderState, problem.`problem_status` as problemStatus, problem.`problem_no` as problemNo, problem.`problem_type` as problemType, problem.`engineering`, problem.`customer`, problem.`vehicle`, problem.product_no as productNo, problem.`bad_content` as badContent, problem.`severity`, problem.`product_line` as productLine, problem.`reason_for_delay` as reasonForDelay, problem.`Speed_of_progress` as speedOfProgress, problem.root_cause as rootCause, problem.permanent_game as permanentGame, problem.problem_progress as problemProgress, (select dwo.`DPCOI_WO_ORDER_TYPE` from dpcoi_wo_order dwo where dwo.`DPCOI_ORDER_ID` = dor.`DPCOI_ORDER_ID` and dwo.`DPCOI_WO_ORDER_STATE` in (1, 2, 3)) as dpcoiWoOrderType from dpcoi_order dor, dpcoi_rr_problem problem
order by dor.`DPCOI_ORDER_ID` desc limit #{start},#{size}
SELECT count(1) from dpcoi_order dor, dpcoi_rr_problem problem

SELECT wf.`ID` as dpcoiWoOrderFileId, wf.`CREATE_BY` as createBy, wf.`CREATE_DATE` as createDate, wf.`wo_file_state` as woFileState, fileInfo.`FILE_ID` as fileId, fileInfo.`FILE_NAME` as fileName, fileInfo.`FILe_TYPE` as fileType, fileInfo.`FILE_ALIAS` as fileAlias, fileInfo.`EXCEL_PDF_NAME` as excelPdfName, DATE_FORMAT(fileInfo.create_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') AS fileCreateDateStr, (select users.`USER_NAME` from sys_users users where users.`USER_ID` = fileInfo.create_by) as createByName from dpcoi_order dor, dpcoi_wo_order dwo, dpcoi_wo_order_file wf, file_upload fileInfo where dor.`DPCOI_ORDER_ID` = dwo.`DPCOI_ORDER_ID` and dwo.`DPCOI_WO_ORDER_ID` = wf.`DPCOI_WO_ORDER_ID` and wf.`FILE_ID` = fileInfo.`FILE_ID` AND dor.`DEL_FLAG` = '0' AND dwo.`DEL_FLAG` = '0' and wf.`DEL_FLAG` = '0' AND dwo.`DPCOI_WO_ORDER_STATE` IN (1,2,3,4) AND dor.`rr_problem_id` = #{rrProblemId,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND dwo.`DPCOI_WO_ORDER_TYPE` = #{dpcoiWoOrderType,jdbcType=BIGINT}
